clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in cancer tumors unspecified and solid tumors

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: In laboratory studies of 28 human tumor cell lines OSI 906 reduced growth of 15 cell lines representative of colorectal lung breast pancreatic and pediatric tumors and in mouse models OSI 906 was particularly effective against tumors that are highly IGF dependent such as colorectal cancers According to the researchers OSI 906 not only slowed tumor growth in mice but decreased the size of some pre existing tumors
